registryKey.description: Enables System.in in java test consoles (JUnit & TestNG)
Enable live time for tests
IdIndex skips .java-files in libraries (index .class-files instead)
Enables 'Build' toolwindow for JPS compilation messages
Case sensitivity of the project file system for compiler references. Available values: SENSITIVE, INSENSITIVE, BY_OS (Defined by OS or VM options), BY_ROOT (Defined by first root)
Use workspace model inside JPS build process. The implementation isn't finished yet, refer to https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IJPL-409 for details.
Path to a JDK home. Force the build process to be run using the JDK specified. It is assumed that the jdk is at least of version 11.

After the build finishes, the IDE will preload and leave waiting in memory the build process for the next compilation. This will save time for process start and project model loading (may be noticeable for big projects).

Specifies the build port at which the build process will wait for debugger connections\n\ if 'Debug Build Process' (available via Find Action) is enabled.\n\ -1 means that a random available port will be chosen.
Delay in milliseconds before triggering auto-make in response to file system events
If at the moment the auto-build is about to start and the IDE is idle for less than specified milliseconds, the automatic build will be postponed in order not to interfere with the user's activity.
Application inactivity period, after which automatic builds may be triggered, if necessary, for all currently opened projects. Set to negative value to disable the feature.

The option allows forcing automatically started builds to run in single-threaded mode even if 'Compile independent modules in parallel' is on\n\ This might help to save CPU resources for the foreground processes.
Specify whether project save in response to document changes is enabled
Delay in milliseconds before triggering save in response to document changes
If a project is not opened for the specified number of days, its build data will be cleared to save disk space
Turn on to display builder execution times as 'Information' messages in the compiler tool window.
Experimental implementation for class-to-class dependency multimap in JPS caches.\nIf turned off after being turned on, project rebuild is required.
Warning: for Intellij project only! \nTurn on to download compilation caches to reduce build time.
Enables Find Usages using references from compiler indices
Enables relevant method chain completion
Enables compiler reference index test actions
Include Vendor name in suggested SDK names
URL of a zip file or a directory containing additional external annotations which will be applied to all modules and libraries
Attempt to add an existing SDK to the SDK table.
Make Java usage inlays computation single-threaded
Runs the build process in a new session on Linux via setsid(1)
Trigger autotest on delay instead of build events
Enable JVM-lang-based run line markers
Clear all environments when running a JVM command line application
Enable instrumentation during tests to be able to start 'tests which pass this code' later
Enables button in Override Methods dialog to sort methods by the percentage of subclasses that override
Using new optimised JavaInjectedFileChangesHandler when editing code injected to Java in the fragment editor
Do not consider implicit usages part of the entry points (editor only)
Max number of scanned files to find usages of a symbol
Max files size in bytes to find usages of a symbol in case there are a few files
Disable deduplication of methods from the same hierarchy if a qualified pattern is used in Goto Symbol
Use shallow unused declaration analysis in batch mode (like in the editor, Java only)
If true, select the line at caret if there is no selection on the introduced variable; when false expressions chooser would be shown
Past participle variants suggested when introducing variables
Show the base class of a method in the Java File Structure view
Whether fields should be stopped at when navigating to the nex/previous structural member by Alt+Down/Up.
Enables using bundled JetBrains Runtime for execution
How long (in minutes) idea will wait for results of synchronized maven dependencies resolution
Enabled maven-less library roots resolver for JPS (for internal JetBrains use only)
The host is used to download dependency config updates for framework starters
Suggested refactoring from call-site in Java
When completing a method call, start a live template with all arguments
If java.completion.argument.live.template is enabled, show completion for method arguments immediately
Show separate constructors when completing constructor call, instead of a single class name
Use code templates to generate JavaDoc stubs
Use additional tags for methods for completion
Suggest static methods/fields after instance qualifier in Java completion
Show 'Create java compact file' separately from all other classes
If not used for the specified period of time or longer, the IDE will shut down the cached javac compilation process
